template.p: With the Food Trucks Industry Package, you have all you need to manage your business from customer bookings to invoicing, including a point-of-sale system and much more.

ul.li: Use the CRM app to manage your opportunities
Send quotations to prospective customers through the Sales app
Manage your presence at events using the Field Service app
Invoice your customers using the Invoice app

template.p: In some cases, you will get bookings from customers (coporate, etc.) for you to attend an company event or other similar events.

Incoming opportunities can be registered into your CRM. Manage opportunity stages in the kanban view, categorization using tags, to-do's and reminders using activities, and communication through the chatter.
Once you have all the information regarding this opportunity, you can make a new quotation. Define how long you'll be staying, and if relevant, other things you will be charging to the customer.

When your prospective customer confirms the sale, a new task is created in your field service app, and linked back to your sale order. You can manage assignations, needs, and so on from there and obtain a handy overview of your planning.

While on the field, you can take orders and payments from your customers or from the attendees through the Point of Sale app. The app is a fully featured point-of-sale solution that supports menus, products, quantities, discounts, pricelists, custom notes, and many other features.
Handle all your customers in a breeze and get a nice overview of your income through the reporting features that are integrated in Odoo.
If applicable, you can invoice your presence to your customer through the invoice app. You can configure your invoice templates to include terms & conditions, as well as other handy features.
